Source
Main stylesheet briefs.xsl
Stylesheet version 2.0
Template /
Documentation

Description

Extracts data from an ordered Briefregesten collection nodeset and outputs as HTML
Namespace No namespace
Match /
Mode #default
Import precedence 0
Source
